trans-unit.target: With the bashful batfish caught, you sense further movement in the shadows.<tab>With the bashful batfish caught, the swimming shadows intensify.<tab>With the bashful batfish caught, the swimming shadows begin to take shape!<tab>The shadow of an elusive sea creature lurks somewhere nearby!
